title: Феномен
overview: There is a new spectacular show on the Russia TV channel! 10 participants of the project, each of whom is endowed with incredible paranormal abilities, will take part in the tests for the title of the best! All of them passed a difficult casting and are now ready to surprise everyone with their unique abilities and show real miracles! Uri Geller is the main character of the program. This is a man with truly outstanding strength: he easily bends steel spoons without touching them, and can fix broken appliances in any home from the TV screen. Invited stars will take part in amazing experiments, who, along with all the other guests of the studio, will become witnesses of incredible, inexplicable events.
